pkgmetadata.longdescription: Static Library and Headers for 'OpenEXR' Image I/O // Provides the 'OpenEXR' static library and 'C++' headers for high- dynamic-range image I/O (see https://openexr.com/) needed to link R packages against the 'OpenEXR' library, along with a basic R interface to load 'EXR' images.
